projects.name: FACE RECOGNITION ATTENDANCE SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed a face recognition attendance system using Python and OpenCV, automating attendance tracking with real-time face detection and recognition, and built a user-friendly web interface using Flask and Javascript. Integrated Firebase for secure, scalable cloud storage for efficient management with real-time updates.

projects.name: IMAGE STEGANOGRAPHY USING PSO, GA and SMO
projects.description: Implemented nature-inspired algorithms like Particle Swarm Optimisation, Genetic Algorithm and Spider Monkey Optimisation algorithm to optimize the embedding process, ensuring efficient utilization of available image space while minimizing distortion. Achieved a significant and near-perfect SSIM of 0.999.

projects.name: TWITTER SENTIMENT ANALYSIS
projects.description: The application leverages Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and Random Forest Classifier to predict the sentiment of user tweets as positive, negative, or neutral with an accuracy of 81%.

experiences.description: Enhanced the photogrammetry pipeline of Project Tirtha, an initiative by NISER Bhubaneswar for 3D reconstruction of heritage sites, by integrating advanced learning-based techniques for feature extraction and matching (e.g., SuperPoint, SuperGlue, LightGlue, LoFTR), resulting in a 10x increase in processing speed. Conducted comprehensive literature reviews, evaluated models, and optimized processes. Analyzed with performance metrics such as runtime, VRAM usage, and Homography AUC.

full_output.name: ADYASHA MAHANTA
achievements_and_awards: Recipient of AWS AI/ML Scholarship for Udacity AI Programming with Python nanodegree

Demonstrated the ability to integrate advanced AI architectures such as VGG16 within command-line applications, enabling seamless model training, validation, and testing for image classification tasks
